Property description

Available in: Español Català English Français Deutsch Italiano Português Dansk Suomi Norsk Nederlands Polski Română русский Svenska Ελληνικά 中文 Українська
Available in: Español Català English Français Deutsch Italiano Português Dansk Suomi Norsk Nederlands Polski Română русский Svenska Ελληνικά 中文 Українська

We present to you EXCLUSIVELY a unique property on the top floor of a royal estate with an exceptional location. La Casa de las Bolas, also known as the Casa de los Picos, is a unique building located in the Salamanca neighborhood, in Madrid. Its name comes from the peculiar façade adorned with protruding stone bollards or “balls”, a feature that gives it a distinctive and striking appearance compared to the architectural style of the surrounding buildings. This peculiar design responds to a mix of historical and artistic influences, which have given rise to a unique structure of its kind and an object of curiosity for those who visit the area.

Built at the beginning of the 20th century, the Casa de las Bolas was designed by architect Julio Martínez Zapata, known for his modernist approach and his ability to integrate innovative and decorative elements in his works. The building has several floors, and its façade is decorated with a series of stone balls that run throughout its exterior in an orderly manner, generating an impressive visual effect.

In addition to its unique façade, the Casa de las Bolas has a structure and interior layout typical of buildings from the early 20th century in Madrid, with high ceilings, large windows and a spacious layout. However, the particularity of its external design makes it a point of interest for photographers, architects and tourists looking for historical and curious buildings in the Spanish capital.

Today, the Casa de las Bolas is a symbol of the Salamanca neighborhood and a leading example of the unique architecture that can be found in Madrid, reminding us of the rich architectural history and creativity of urban designs that have shaped this city.

Currently being renovated, this spacious home has six bedrooms and four bathrooms.
This unique and unique home has 14 balconies facing the street, in addition to its magnificent south-east, west orientation, it offers you, as it is a corner and with height, an unmatched luminosity, from where you can see the skyline of Madrid from an unbeatable situation. A few meters from Retiro Park, the green lung of the city.

Don't miss this investment opportunity in one of the most sought-after areas. Contact us for more information and to schedule a visit!

Walter Haus Real Estate is a real estate group based in the main capitals of Spain, in the main locations of Madrid, Barcelona and Costa Brava.

We have more than 20 years of experience, with a dynamic team of professionals with experience in personal advice in constant training and with a very specific specialization in each area of action, which allows us to find solutions to the needs of each client.
